summary: This bill, the Extend the TikTok Deadline Act (S. 103), aims to amend the Protecting Americans from Foreign Adversary Controlled Applications Act. It seeks to extend the deadline for TikTok's sale to avoid a ban, specifically changing the original 270-day deadline to 540 days. The bill was introduced in the Senate by Mr. Markey, Mr. Wyden, and Mr. Booker and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
